  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Manager",
  "description": "Pragmatic Technologies Limited is a holding company that has top brand presence in Nigeria: PRAG (a top leading brand for stabilizers, inverters, batteries, solar and other power products). It was incorporated in LAGOS, Nigeria with Registration Number 277126. It was registered on 01 Aug 1995. The official brand of Pragmatic Technologies is PRAG.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Obanikoro, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Social Media Manager will lead the strategy, planning, execution, and optimization of all social media activities to build brand visibility, engage audiences, and drive conversions.
	The ideal candidate is both strategic and hands-on, with the ability to manage multiple platforms, especially Meta (Facebook &amp; Instagram), X (Twitter), LinkedIn, YouTube, and WhatsApp Business.


Key Responsibilities
Strategy &amp; Planning:


	Develop and implement social media strategies aligned with overall marketing and business goals.
	Plan monthly content calendars across all platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, YouTube, WhatsApp, etc.).
	Identify and segment target audiences for tailored content and campaigns.
	Monitor trends, industry news, and competitor activities to inform strategy.


Content Management:


	Work closely with the Content Strategist/Copywriter to produce engaging and brand-aligned content.
	Schedule and manage daily posts, ensuring a consistent tone of voice and visual identity.
	Tailor content specifically for LinkedIn to position the company as an industry leader.
	Coordinate with designers and video editors to produce high-quality creatives and videos.
	Leverage user-generated content and influencer collaborations where applicable.


Community Engagement:


	Actively engage with followers, respond to comments, DMs, and mentions across all channels.
	Build and nurture strong online communities and brand advocates.
	Engage professionally on LinkedIn with relevant industry stakeholders, clients, and partners.


Performance &amp; Reporting:


	Track and analyze performance metrics: engagement, reach, follower growth, conversions, and ROI.
	Generate weekly/monthly performance reports with insights and recommendations.
	Continuously optimize strategies based on data and platform algorithms.


Campaign &amp; Collaboration:


	Collaborate with the Ads Specialist for integrated organic + paid campaigns.
	Plan and execute social media campaigns, contests, live events, influencer collaborations, and partnerships.
	Work closely with the Content/Copywriter to ensure messaging is clear, persuasive, and aligned across channels.


KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)


	Monthly follower and engagement growth (per platform).
	Engagement and conversation quality on LinkedIn.
	Conversion rates from social media to leads or sales.
	Content publishing consistency and timeliness.
	Campaign ROI and performance metrics.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.
	Minimum 2 to 3 years of proven experience managing brand social media accounts.
	Strong understanding of Meta (Facebook &amp; Instagram), LinkedIn, X (Twitter), YouTube, and WhatsApp Business.
	Excellent copywriting, captioning, and storytelling skills.
	Proficiency with social media management and analytics tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer, Zoho Social).
	Strong communication, time management, and multitasking skills.


Nice-to-Have Skills:


	Experience with influencer and B2B LinkedIn marketing.
	Familiarity with social commerce tools and lead generation funnels.
	Basic graphic design or short-form video editing skills.
	Experience in a fast-paced SME or technology/energy sector.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;application to:&nbsp;hr@prag.global&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Customer Care Assistant Job at MagikWorld




        
    

        
        MagikWorld was founded in 2013 with the vision of transforming the way people celebrate life’s meaningful moments. Since its inception, the company has grown to become a leading gifting services brand in Nigeria, with offices in Lagos, Abuja, and Ile-Ife, and its head office in Abuja, FCT.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



From humble beginnings of curating thoughtful gift boxes for individuals, MagikWorld has evolved into a full-service gifting company catering to both individuals and corporate organizations. Over the years, it has built a reputation for creativity, innovation, and reliability, consistently delivering unique gifting experiences that delight customers and foster lasting connections. Today, MagikWorld is recognized not only for the quality and originality of its gifts, but also for its ability to reduce stress for customers by providing end-to-end gifting solutions — from sourcing, packaging, customization, to delivery.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Assistant

Job Location: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT) 
Job Type: Full Time (On-site)
Work Schedule: 5 days on, 5 days off

Role Overview


	MagikWorld Global Services is seeking a friendly, proactive, and customer-focused Customer Care Assistant to join our team. The ideal candidate will handle client inquiries, process orders, and ensure every customer enjoys a seamless and satisfying experience from first contact to final delivery.


Responsibilities


	Attend to customer inquiries via phone, social media, and in-person visits.
	Process and confirm customer orders accurately and promptly.
	Follow up on deliveries and provide timely updates to clients.
	Handle customer complaints or requests professionally and efficiently.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions.
	Support marketing and sales efforts through excellent customer engagement.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Mass Communication, Business Administration, or a related field.
	1–2 years of experience in customer service or front desk roles.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Good command of written and spoken English.
	Proficiency in using WhatsApp, Instagram, and basic office tools.
	Must reside in Abuja or be willing to stay within company accommodation during duty periods.


Salary
N80,000 / month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: Magikworldvacancies@gmail.com using "Application – Customer Care Assistant (Abuja)” as the subject of the mail.
